ygData.subject: Re: Pie Tins
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually found both from a vendor in Halas.... go left just inside the front gates, and it s the first shop you run into. ... From: talonz
ygData.messageBody:
I actually found both from a vendor in Halas.... go left just inside the
front gates, and it's the first shop you run into.

-----Original Message-----
From: talonz [mailto:talonz@...]
Sent: Monday, July 05, 1999 8:44 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Pie Tins


From: "talonz" <talonz@...>

Has Anybody found out where to buy pie tins? Does anybody in
Ak'anon or on the island sell them or do I have to goto Antonica?



-Talonz
